Threat: Nature: Earthquake, major natural disaster or hardware failure destroys configuration server
Countermeasure: Fast automatic reconfiguration of new Ansible server with Vagrant, Ansible playbooks with server configurations stored in remote git repository

Threat: Nature: Earthquake, major natural disaster or hardware failure destroys log or backup server
Countermeasure: Server locations have low seismic activity
Additional Countermeasures: Add geographically redundant log and backup server
